participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: A determined and ambitious individual who enjoys luxury and has a keen sense for fashion.
participant_1.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: A laid-back and friendly guy who loves working on cars and enjoys the simple pleasures of life like country music and his dogs.
participant_2.background: i like to work on vintage cars. i own two vintage mustangs. i like to go to country concerts on weekends. my favorite music is country. i have two dogs.

content.text: Oh my god! My fogs are missing
